item.title: Theresa add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Theresa add a quote by Richard P. Feynman
item.description: "We are at the very beginning of time for the human race. It is not unreasonable that we grapple with problems. But there are tens of thousands of years in the future. Our responsibility is to do what we can, learn what we can, improve the solutions, and pass them on." -- Richard P. Feynman

item.title: Theresa add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "We will restore science to its rightful place and wield technology's wonders to raise health care's quality and lower its cost." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Theresa add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "Painful as it may be, a significant emotional event can be the catalyst for choosing a direction that serves us - and those around us - more effectively. Look for the learning." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Theresa add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Religion has convinced people that there's an invisible man ... living in the sky. Who watches everything you do every minute of every day. And the invisible man has a list of ten specific things he doesn't want you to do. And if you do any of these things, he will send you to a special place, of burning and fire and smoke and torture and anguish for you to live forever, and suffer, and suffer, and burn, and scream, until the end of time. But he loves you. He loves you. He loves you and he needs money." -- George Carlin

item.title: Theresa add a quote by Bill Gates, Jr.
item.description: "Well, if you’re not fully utilizing half the talent in the country, you’re not going to get too close to the Top 10." -- Bill Gates, Jr.

item.title: Theresa add a quote by Madeleine Albright
item.description:
"There is a special place in hell for women who don't help other women."
(Keynote speech at <i>Celebrating Inspiration</i> luncheon with the WNBA's All-Decade Team, 2006)" -- Madeleine Albright

item.title: Theresa add a quote by Diana Nyad
item.description: "Never, ever give up. You're never too old to chase your dreams. It looks like a solitary sport, but really a team effort" -- Diana Nyad

item.title: Theresa add a quote by Wendy Davis
item.description: "I pursued education not instead of being a good mother, but because being a good mother required that I build a better life for my family." -- Wendy Davis
